# `cd` for [filesystem](/commands/categories/filesystem.md)

<div class='command-title'>Change directory.</div>

## Signature

```> cd {flags} (path)```

## Parameters

 -  `path`: The path to change to.


## Input/output types:

| input   | output  |
| ------- | ------- |
| nothing | nothing |
| string  | nothing |
## Examples

Change to your home directory
```nu
> cd ~

```

Change to the previous working directory ($OLDPWD)
```nu
> cd -

```
